title: Emerald Blossom Polki Ring - Ratnagarbha Pachala Anguliya
features: Intricate floral design with a central Emerald cabochon surrounded by shimmering Polki diamonds. The setting showcases a delicate openwork pattern, enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones. Features a modern interpretation of the traditional 'Mogra' flower design, popular in South Indian jewelry. The use of Polki diamonds adds a rustic, antique charm. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, known for their exceptional craftsmanship.
colors: Lustrous gold with a vibrant green Emerald center and sparkling white Polki diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
or as a statement piece for any evening event. Adds a touch of regal elegance to any outfit.
description: This ring is a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The use of genuine Polki diamonds and a vivid Emerald cabochon makes it a truly unique piece. Handcrafted in Hyderabad, known for its rich jewelry heritage, it is a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom. Exquisite craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty.
